column4: I'd like to search launchpad for bugs in the packages virtualbox-ose and virtualbox-ose-modules. How do i do that? Just searching for virtualbox under bugs "kind of" works, but it also lists a lot of unrelated bugs.
so i'd like to specify the package and launchpad doesn't seem to let me
just open those package's pages, click the bugs tab and then search.  If you need any other help ask in #launchpad.
